title: This Sounds
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: Listen! What do you hear? How can you describe the different ways things sound? This Sounds is a delightful story that introduces students to adjectives that tell how things sound. The colorful illustrations and repetitive text will help support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to identify simple cause-and-effect relationships and to recognize and use complete sentences.
meta: boring, noisy, quiet, silly, sounds, squeaky
Connect to prior knowledge to better understand text
Cause and Effect : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words so and this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
